name: CARDIOLOGY
info: The Cardiology Department of Medicure Center has gained reputation for its dynamic and innovation in the diagnosis, investigation and treatment of patients with all forms of heart diseases.
description: The Cardiology Department of Medicure Center has gained reputation for its dynamic and innovation in the diagnosis, investigation and treatment of patients with all forms of heart diseases, both generally encountered and complex cases. We have a dedicated unit of four full-time Consultants, and a team of junior doctors, nurses, and technicians trained to the highest standard in cardiac assessment. Our specialists diagnose and manage full range of heart conditions, and we are fully equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and complete range of services – from cardiac investigations to Interventional Cardiology procedures in ultramodern Catheterization Lab (Cath Lab). Cardio-pulmonary rehabilitation program is offered to patients through our Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation Centre. The hospital offers a multidisciplinary in-patient program, and also has complete Coronary Care Unit and Cardiothoracic ICU for critical cardiac patients. For emergency patients, we have 24-hour Accident & Emergency Centre and specialized team for stabilization and treatment of the patient

name: ULTRASONOGRAPHY
info: Diagnostic ultrasound, also called sonography or diagnostic medical sonography, is an imaging method that uses high-frequency sound waves to produce images of structures within your body.
description: Diagnostic ultrasound, also called sonography or diagnostic medical sonography, is an imaging method that uses high-frequency sound waves to produce images of structures within your body. The images can provide valuable information for diagnosing and treating a variety of diseases and conditions. Most ultrasound examinations are done using an ultrasound device outside your body, though some involve placing a device inside your body.

name: GYNECOLOGY
info: The Department of Obstetrics & Gynaecology of Medicure Center provides comprehensive services to women in the treatment and management of gynaecologic and obstetric conditions.
description: The Department of Obstetrics & Gynaecology of Medicure Center provides comprehensive services to women in the treatment and management of gynaecologic and obstetric conditions – from routine care to complex high-risk situations. We treat variety of problems of female reproductive organs and utilize minimally invasive laparoscopic surgeries and laser surgeries. Our maternity services manage and care for women during pregnancy, childbirth and postnatal periods. The department is fully equipped with state-of-the-art Maternity Unit, which has built-in labour OT, labour rooms and Neonatal Intensive Care Unit. We also provide breast feeding counselling, as well as antenatal counselling sessions.

name: HEMATOLOGY
info: Hematology is the branch of medicine which focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of disorders of the blood and bone marrow (blood-forming tissue). Department of Hematology of Medicure Center
description: Hematology is the branch of medicine which focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of disorders of the blood and bone marrow (blood-forming tissue). Department of Hematology of Medicure Center provides modern treatment and management for all spectrum of benign and malignant blood-related disorders including autologous bone marrow transplant (BMT). The hospital is equipped with state-of-the-art Hematology Lab, under coordination of our Hematology Consultant, through which we offer comprehensive analysis and interpretation of various hematological tests for appropriate screening, diagnosis and check-up. The Blood Bank uses cutting-edge technology and has the most secure blood transfusion policy, maintaining quality in every aspect, and capable of providing all kinds of blood components 24 hours a day.
